name: 2022 11th International Conference on Software and Computer Applications（ICSCA 2022）
content: PUBLICATION： ICSCA 2022 conference proceedings' ISBN number is 978-1-4503-8577-0 You are invited to submit manuscript to ICSCA 2022\. The accepted paper will be included into ICSCA 2022 Conference Proceedings, which will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM, which will be archived in ACM Digital Library, and indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science).
